message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC. 

The paper focuses on enabling robots to learn from a single demonstration and auxiliary video data, which is a common problem in the field of robotics (cs.RO). The approach involves localizing actions in unsegmented videos, which requires computer vision techniques (cs.CV). The paper also uses metalearning and reinforcement learning, which are common machine learning techniques (cs.LG, cs.AI). Finally, the goal of the paper is to enable robots to learn tasks more effectively, which is related to human-robot interaction (cs.HC).
